topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Install the Application Lifecycle Service (ALS)

ul.li: The HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, must already be installed.
There is no additional section in the clouds.yaml file for the Application Lifecycle Service.

ol.li: SSH into the HP Helion OpenStack Deployer. (This is the same location where the HDPI has been installed.)

Install the Application Lifecycle Service
If you pre-downloaded the installation file, run the following command to install it:cd <directory where the pre-downloaded file is> openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install <filename>Make sure you run the installer from the same directory where the installation files are. If the installer cannot find a file with the name you provided in the local directory, it will attempt to download the files again.
If you did not pre-download the file:
Find the most recent version of the file. Note that this command provides only a quick list of recent files; there are more complete listing options available that include installation status.openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi list The output should look similar to:+----------------------------+----------------+-----------+------------+ | service | id | version | state | +----------------------------+----------------+-----------+------------+ | Helion Code Engine | wscatalog.2776 | 1.0.0 | available | | als | wscatalog.2765 | 2.0.0.539 | available | | als | wscatalog.2800 | 2.0.0.548 | available | | database | wscatalog.2762 | 2.0.0.32 | available | | database | wscatalog.2803 | 2.0.0.37 | available | | messaging | wscatalog.2761 | 1.0.0 | available | | messaging | wscatalog.2796 | 1.0.0.165 | available | +----------------------------+----------------+-----------+------------+
Find the ID number of the most recent version of the service (the highest ID number for that service).
If desired, inspect the installation files for size, version, and other detailed information.openstack hdpi show wscatalog.#### --os-cloud mycloud
Begin the download and installation:openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install wscatalog.#### Downloading may take a significant amount of time; depending on network traffic, it could take 20-90 minutes.During installation, this command will generate output similar to the following: Downloading Application Lifecycle Service which is available Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (available) Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (downloading) ... Application Lifecycle Service is (downloaded) Staging Application Lifecycle Service in Glance/Swift Application Lifecycle Service is staged UI installed for application lifecycle service Create service endpoint for service application lifecycle service Completed installing application
